1 Memory Status page
* Version: $xwiki.version
#set($monitor = $xwiki.getXWiki().getPluginManager().getPlugin("monitor")) #set($nbreq = $xwiki.parseInt("${monitor.requests}"))
* Number of Requests: $nbreq * Free: $xwiki.xWiki.freeMemory() * Max: $xwiki.xWiki.maxMemory() * Total: $xwiki.xWiki.totalMemory()
* Number of wikis loaded: $!xwiki.xWiki.virtualWikiList.size() * Cached Docs: $!xwiki.xWiki.store.cache.numberEntries * Cached Page Exists: $!xwiki.xWiki.store.pageExistCache.numberEntries #set($r = $xwiki.xWiki.getRenderingEngine()) #if($r) * Rendering Cache: $!xwiki.xWiki.getPrivateField($r,"cache").numberEntries #end #set($g = $r.getRenderer("groovy")) #if($g) * Groovy cache: $!xwiki.xWiki.getPrivateField($g,"cache").numberEntries * Groovy class cache: $!xwiki.xWiki.getPrivateField($g,"classCache").numberEntries #end #set($gr = $xwiki.xWiki.getGroupService($context.context)) #if($gr) * Group Cache: $!xwiki.xWiki.getPrivateField($gr,"groupCache").numberEntries #end 1.1 Free some memory
